title: Women Sequin Sexy V Neck Shift Dress Sparkly Glitter Sleeveless Short Flowy Loose Party Night Out Club Dress

【Garment Care】Hand wash only, do not machine wash, do not dry clean. Please check our own size chart before ordering this women's sparkle dress to choose which size will fit you.
